txt.en: Brioc is in the northern reaches of the town of Herne, waiting for your report.
Brioc asked you to <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> for threats to Herne at two cross-roads near the town: one to the west, and one to the north.
'You saw nothing worrisome either to the west or to the north of Herne? That is a relief. Thank you for setting my mind at ease.'
<rgb=#00FF00>Look</rgb> for dangers to Herne at the western cross-road
All is quiet at this meeting of the ways west of Herne
<rgb=#00FF00>Look</rgb> for dangers to Herne at the northern cross-road
Brioc wants you to scout for potential dangers on the road that encircles Herne.
This is one of the cross-roads Brioc wanted you to scout
Find the cross-road north-west of Herne
No obvious threats make themselves known at this cross-road north-west of Herne
Find the cross-road west of Herne

'Herne stands on a rocky plateau overlooking Ruddymore, and the road takes a wide loop around the town. Do you think you could go to the cross-roads to the west and to the north of Herne, and <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> for any signs of danger? A foul mood has settled upon the town in recent days, and I grow increasingly worried that some evil might have set its sights upon this town where I was born.\n\n'I don't remember it being like this in all my years, and my sister and I have lived here all our lives.'
This is one of the cross-roads Brioc wanted you to scout

'Do you think you could go to the cross-roads to the west and to the north of Herne, and <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> for any signs of danger? A foul mood has settled upon the town in recent days, and I grow increasingly worried that some evil might have set its sights upon this town where I was born.'
